CatDescriptText: Rev. Samuel Stephens, 1317 N. Homewood Avenue, was part of the Pittsburghers Speak Up column published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, October 3, 1959, pg. A1 with question: "Who do you think is responsible for the failure to pass effective civil rights legislation in Congress?"  Answer reads: "The Republicans, who never did do anything for the Negro or the poor people."
TitMainTitle: Portrait of Rev. Samuel Stephens wearing light colored pinstriped suit jacket, plaid necktie, and light colored hat with band, standing on sidewalk with buildings and two women in background
